/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The street is teeming with life, filled with cars and pedestrians going about their day. The buildings lining the street are predominantly white, punctuated with occasional red and green accents that add a splash of color to the urban landscape. The trees lining the street provide a touch of nature amidst the concrete structures. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting a warm glow on the scene.
